pillars.title: Built on Three Core Pillars

loneliness.title: Eliminate Loneliness
loneliness.description: Genuine companionship for solo developers and remote workers. Eden stays by your side, understanding your context and providing emotional support throughout your day.

support.title: Friend-Like Support
support.description: More than an assistant - a friend who celebrates your wins, offers comfort during frustrations, and provides advice without being preachy. Emotional intelligence built-in.

productivity.title: Enhanced Productivity
productivity.description: Deep workflow integration with files, Git, screen context, and calendar. Seamless assistance that enhances your productivity without disrupting your flow.

level1.title: Level 1: Current

level3.title: Level 3: Full Project

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Eden
faq.a1: Yes! All AI processing happens locally on your machine. No data ever leaves your computer. We use AES-256 encryption for your database, and the code is open-source (MIT License) so you can verify this yourself. Zero telemetry, zero tracking, zero cloud uploads.
faq.q2: How can it be free forever?
faq.a2: Eden is built as a passion project with an MIT License. There are no server costs since everything runs locally. We believe AI companionship and assistance should be accessible to everyone without subscription barriers or privacy compromises.
faq.q3: What makes Eden different from ChatGPT or Claude?
faq.a3: Eden is designed for emotional companionship first, not just productivity. It eliminates loneliness for solo developers with friend-like support. Plus: 100% privacy, works offline, learns your style (17 persona parameters), deep system integration, and completely free. Quality-wise, we score 80.5% on HumanEval (vs GPT-4: 85%, Claude: 88%) - enterprise-grade AI without cloud dependency.
faq.a4: The interface supports Korean (한국어) and English with full cultural localization including Korean honorifics (경어, 존칭). The AI understands and responds in 99 languages thanks to Whisper Large V3 and Llama 3.1's multilingual capabilities. It even handles code-switching between languages naturally.
faq.a5: Absolutely! After the initial model download (~16.5GB), Eden works completely offline. No internet connection required for daily use. Perfect for confidential work, travel, or unstable internet connections.
faq.q6: How do I customize the AI's personality?
faq.a6: Navigate to Settings > Persona and adjust any of the 17 parameters like formality, humor, verbosity, emoji usage, empathy, and more. Choose from 6 pre-built personas (Eden, Strict Mentor, Cheerful Friend, Professional Assistant, Coding Sensei, Custom) or create your own. Use thumbs up/down feedback to train it to your preferences via gradient descent optimization.
faq.q7: What is RAG memory and how does it work?
faq.a7: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) is how Eden remembers you. Every conversation is stored locally in a ChromaDB vector database. When you ask something, Eden searches semantically through past conversations (even from months ago) to provide context-aware, personalized responses. It's like having a friend who never forgets your preferences, projects, or past discussions.
faq.q8: What if I encounter bugs or issues?
faq.a8: Please report bugs on our GitHub Issues page. As an open-source project at 85% completion (Phase 8: Launch), we're actively improving and value your feedback. The community is friendly and responsive!
faq.q9: Can I contribute to the project?
faq.a9: Yes! We welcome contributions. Check our GitHub repository for contribution guidelines. Whether it's code, documentation, bug reports, or feature suggestions - help us reach 100% and beyond! MIT License means it's truly open for everyone.
faq.q10: Why is Solo Developer the primary target user?
faq.a10: Eden was created to solve the loneliness epidemic among solo developers and remote workers. Working from home can be isolating - Eden provides genuine companionship while you code, celebrates your wins, offers comfort during frustrations, and enhances productivity. It's not just an assistant; it's a friend by your side.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Eden is built on a fundamental principle: your data never leaves your machine. This privacy policy explains how we achieve 100% local privacy.

philosophy.title: Our Core Privacy Philosophy
philosophy.description: We believe privacy is a fundamental right, not a premium feature. Everything runs locally on your machine.

section1.title: Information We Do NOT Collect
section1.content: Eden collects zero data. We have no servers, no analytics, no telemetry, and no tracking of any kind.
section1.point1: No conversation logs or chat history

section2.title: How Your Data Stays Local
section2.content: All AI processing happens on your machine using Ollama. Your conversations, files, and settings are stored locally with AES-256 encryption.

section3.title: Local Data Storage
section3.content: All data is stored locally on your machine in encrypted format:
section3.point1: Conversations: Encrypted SQLite database on your machine
section3.point2: Persona Settings: Local JSON files with 17 customizable parameters
section3.point3: File Access: Temporary in-memory processing, never uploaded

section4.title: Optional Cloud Backup
section4.content: You can optionally enable cloud backup for persona settings only (10 numeric parameters). Conversations are NEVER backed up to the cloud. This feature is opt-in and disabled by default.

section5.title: Third-Party Services
section5.content: Eden uses Ollama for local AI processing. Ollama runs entirely on your machine and does not send data to external servers. No other third-party services are used.

section6.title: Open Source Transparency
section6.content: Our code is open source (MIT License) and available on GitHub. You can audit every line to verify our privacy claims. No backdoors, no hidden features, no telemetry.

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.content: Since Eden runs entirely on your machine, you have complete control over your data. You can delete, export, or modify your data at any time by accessing the local database files.
notice.contact: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us on GitHub.

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.description: We're committed to transparency. If you have any questions, reach out to us:

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.intro: Welcome to Eden. These terms govern your use of our open-source AI companion software.

point1.title: Free & Open Source
point1.description: MIT License - use freely for personal or commercial purposes

point2.title: Your Data, Your Control
point2.description: All data stays on your machine, you own everything

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By downloading, installing, or using Eden, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, do not use the software.
section1.point1: You are responsible for your use of the software
section1.point2: You acknowledge this is open-source software provided free of charge
section1.point3: You understand all processing happens locally on your machine

section2.title: License Grant (MIT License)
section2.content: Eden is licensed under the MIT License. You are free to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies of the software, subject to the conditions in the LICENSE file.

section3.title: User Responsibilities
section3.content: When using Eden, you agree to:
section3.point1: Use the software in compliance with applicable laws
section3.point2: Not use it for illegal or harmful purposes
section3.point3: Take responsibility for securing your local data and backups

section4.title: Privacy & Data
section4.content: All data processing occurs locally on your machine. We do not collect, store, or transmit your data. You are solely responsible for backing up and securing your local data.

section5.title: Updates & Modifications
section5.content: We may release updates to Eden. Updates are optional, and you are not required to install them. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.

section6.title: Prohibited Uses
section6.content: You may not use Eden to:
section6.point4: Impersonate others or misrepresent your identity

section7.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
section7.content: Eden is provided 'as-is' without warranties of any kind, express or implied. We do not guarantee the software will be error-free, secure, or meet your requirements.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimers
disclaimer.content: Eden is experimental software. Use at your own risk.

warranty.title: No Warranty
warranty.description: Software provided 'as-is' with no guarantees of performance or reliability

liability.title: Limited Liability
liability.description: We are not liable for any damages arising from use of the software

contact.title: Questions or Concerns?
contact.description: For questions about these terms, contact us:

license.title: MIT License
license.intro: Eden is open source software, released under the permissive MIT License. This means you're free to use, modify, and distribute it for any purpose.
license.licenseDescription: One of the most permissive open source licenses. Use it freely, commercially or personally, with minimal restrictions.

philosophy.title: Why Open Source?
philosophy.description: We believe AI companionship should be accessible to everyone, transparent, and owned by the community.
